DOC.brief_title: Allogeneic Human Mesenchymal Stem Cells ( hMSCs ) Infusion Patients With Treatment Resistant Depression
DOC.detailed_description: This phase I study , eighty ( 80 ) patient fulfil inclusion/exclusion criterion 's randomly assign receive allogeneic Human Mesenchymal Stem Cell ( hMSCs ) placebo 1:1 blinded fashion . 40 patient receive single administration allogeneic hMSCs another 40 patient receive single administration Placebo 1:1 blind fashion . Following infusion , patient follow 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 12 week 's post-infusion complete safety efficacy assessment . Patients additionally follow 12 month post-infusion .
